TopicTitle: Problem returing from Duna to Kerbin.

Articles.Content:
Hello guys

I am new to the forum and I am not sure If I posted in the right section ,but please forgive me if I did not.I am a bit overwelmed. I have paused the game because I am not sure how to proceed.And I need your help in order to return to Kerbin from Duna.

Here is the situation:

I send a rescue mission to Duna to pick 1 Kerbal from a previous mission. Everything was fine I landed, picked up the dude and departed again in the correct time, now I am in a inclined orbit around Duna and I want to return to Kerbin. I calculated the phase angle and the angle to prograde and I found them

phase angle: -75.19

angle to retrograde: 123

Are the above correct?

You can see my orbit around Duna below on the screenshots ,and you can also see some more info like dV remaining etc.
Try this But you have plenty of dV to make it back.

2600 delta-v?

you could make it to Eeloo if you wanted to

Try this But you have plenty of dV to make it back.

That is an amazing tool , I bookmarked it , I was using a simple one before which only showed me phase angles..

The kerbals are now back to kerbin! Thank you very much.

2600 delta-v?

you could make it to Eeloo if you wanted to

Well this would not have been a rescue mission if the Kerbals didn't return back home
